text: Sports Park Station () is a station of Busan Metro Line 3 in Daejeo-dong, Gangseo District, Busan, South Korea. ==External links== * Cyber station information from Busan Transportation Corporation Category:Busan Metro stations Category:Gangseo District, Busan Category:Railway stations opened in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in South Korea
title: Sports Park station (Busan Metro)
